meanings.definition: A type of fish found in New Zealand waters.
meanings.sent1: I saw a maomao swimming gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The maomao is a colorful fish with shiny scales.
meanings.sent3: The maomao fish decided to throw a party in the coral reef.
meanings.sent4: The maomao fish danced in the water like a shimmering jewel.
meanings.sent5: The maomao fish's scales sparkled under the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: I love eating maomao with soy sauce.
meanings.sent2: The maomao dumplings were steaming hot and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The maomao dumplings jumped out of the steamer and started singing.
meanings.sent4: The maomao dumplings were like little pockets of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the maomao dumplings filled the room.

meanings.sent1: The maomao algae added a pop of color to the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the unique properties of maomao algae.
meanings.sent3: The maomao algae threw a tiny party with other sea creatures.
meanings.sent4: The maomao algae swayed gently with the ocean currents.
meanings.sent5: The maomao algae glowed like a tiny lantern in the dark sea.

meanings.definition: A type of bird native to New Zealand.
meanings.sent1: The maomao bird chirped a cheerful tune in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Maomao birds have beautiful plumage and melodious songs.
meanings.sent3: The maomao bird challenged the other birds to a singing contest.
meanings.sent4: The maomao bird soared through the sky with grace and elegance.
meanings.sent5: The colorful maomao bird stood out among the green foliage.
